com.kolbly.android.fragments
Class SetLoanNameDialog

java.lang.Object
  android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      android.support.v4.app.DialogFragment
          com.kolbly.android.fragments.SetLoanNameDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener
public class SetLoanNameDialog
extends android.support.v4.app.DialogFragment
implements android.content.DialogInterface.OnClickListener

Dialog fragment where user can input a loan name

Note: This dialog uses the Bus to post the result - listeners must listen for a SetLoanNameDialogEvent event to get the result

Author:
mkolbly
